users.name: Sarah Chen
users.intro: Junior at University of Utah studying Design & CS. Built my first health app during a summer internship at a YC startup.
users.background: Started as the design lead for UUtah's health tech club. Previously interned at a mental health startup where I redesigned their patient onboarding flow. Working on an app to help students find and book mental health resources on campus.

users.name: Marcus Rodriguez
users.intro: Senior at BYU in Computer Science. Been coding since high school, love building tools that make life easier.
users.background: Built a popular Chrome extension for students (10k+ users) that organizes Canvas assignments better. Did a summer internship at Microsoft. Now working on an AI study buddy that helps explain complex topics to students.

users.name: Alex Thompson
users.intro: Senior at Utah State University, passionate about making investing accessible to college students.
users.background: President of USU's Fintech Club. Won second place at Utah's fintech hackathon. Interned at Robinhood last summer. Building a platform that helps college students start investing with as little as $5.

users.name: Emma Wright
users.intro: Junior at Weber State studying Data Science and Business Analytics.
users.background: Lead data analyst for Weber State's Business Analytics Club. Created a predictive model for student retention that's being implemented by the university. Currently working on a platform that helps local businesses make data-driven decisions.

users.name: David Park
users.intro: Senior at Utah Valley University majoring in Software Engineering.
users.background: Founded UVU's Mobile Dev Club. Developed three iOS apps currently on the App Store. Interned at Adobe in Salt Lake City. Building a social platform for connecting college entrepreneurs in Utah.

users.name: Rachel Martinez
users.intro: Senior at Westminster College studying Marketing and Computer Science.
users.background: Marketing lead for Westminster's Tech Entrepreneurship Society. Ran successful digital campaigns for local startups. Currently developing a platform that helps small businesses automate their social media marketing.
